actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to provide that volunteers serving in the Service Corps of Retired Executives may provide services to certain home health agencies.

summary.text: Provides, under the Domestic Volunteer Service Act, that volunteers serving in the Service Corps of Retired Executives may provide services to eligible home health agencies providing home health services. Defines "home health agency" as meaning any private nonprofit agency or organization which is primarily engaged in providing skilled nursing services and other therapeutic services, and which meets other specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to provide that volunteers serving in the Service Corps of Retired Executives may provide services to certain home health agencies.
